name: Run broadcaster tests sequentially
notes: The broadcaster tests use shared global state (debug/session-id, debug/subscriber-count atoms) that causes race conditions when tests run concurrently. Solution: (1) Move all broadcaster tests (lines 693-904 of test_debug_handler.valk) to run AFTER the other tests complete, (2) Run them ONE AT A TIME by chaining done callbacks. Each broadcaster test should call debug/reset-state at the start. Modify test_debug_handler.valk to: separate broadcaster tests from main test list, run main tests first via test/run-async, then when those complete, run broadcaster tests sequentially with chained callbacks.
accept: All 36 tests pass when running test_debug_handler.valk multiple times (at least 5 runs). No TIMEOUT or FAIL. Broadcaster tests run after non-broadcaster tests.

name: Final verification: all 36 tests pass
notes: After running broadcaster tests sequentially, run full test suite and verify all 36 tests pass with no failures or timeouts
accept: All 36 tests pass; no TIMEOUT or FAIL in output
